name: Interstellar Conquest
description:
INTRO

In this immersive turn-based strategy game, you command a fleet of spaceships as you explore the galaxy. Battle for control over a variety of planets, each with unique class levels and building capabilities. Master the challenges of navigating through asteroid fields and ion storms in nebulas, using them to your advantage, or seeking refuge from your enemies. Outmaneuver opponents by strategically placing markets and factories on the planets you control. The ultimate goal is to become the dominant space power, rising above the competition to claim victory. Get ready for an exciting journey through the stars in this thrilling game of space strategy.

MAIN FEATURES

  • Embark on a journey to conquer the galaxy and become the ultimate space power!
  • Explore and colonize a vast universe of diverse planets, each with unique building opportunities to match your strategy.
  • Assemble an unstoppable fleet with a range of ships, including fighters, bombers, gunboats, destroyers, cruisers, battleships, and giant carriers.
  • Choose from 3 powerful space factions, each with its own strengths and abilities.
  • Test your skills in premade scenarios.
  • Take your battles to the next level by creating custom maps with the powerful Map Editor.

The stars await your command!

Interstellar Conquest is inspired by a game called Strategic Commander launched for PalmOS a millennia ago.
